errors.error_description: The README suggests running examples before providing the installation instructions, which is an incorrect logical order.
correction_candidates: Move the installation command `mamba create ...` to be before the mention of the example models.
Add a note saying 'You must install Calliope before running the examples'.
Combine the installation and running examples into a single code block.
Remove the sentence 'You can start by running these examples.'
errors.golden_answer: Move the installation command `mamba create ...` to be before the mention of the example models.

errors.error_description: The link to the example models is broken, pointing to a non-existent path (`master/example_models`) instead of the correct one.
correction_candidates: Correct the URL to `https://github.com/calliope-project/calliope/tree/main/src/calliope/example_models`.
Correct the URL to `https://github.com/calliope-project/calliope/tree/main/examples`.
Remove the link and just mention that examples are included.
Correct the URL to `https://github.com/calliope-project/calliope/blob/main/src/calliope/example_models`.

errors.error_description: A confusing and incorrect statement was added, claiming that YAML files must be manually compiled, which is not true for Calliope.
correction_candidates: Remove the sentence 'Note that all YAML files must be manually compiled into a single file before running a model.'
Change the sentence to 'Calliope automatically compiles all model files.'
Change the sentence to 'Model definitions can be split across multiple YAML files which are combined at runtime.'
Replace 'manually compiled' with 'validated using a linter'.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence 'Note that all YAML files must be manually compiled into a single file before running a model.'

errors.error_description: The installation command is missing the `-c conda-forge` channel argument, which is necessary to locate the `calliope` package.
correction_candidates: Add `-c conda-forge` to the `mamba create` command.
Add a separate command `conda config --add channels conda-forge` before the installation command.
Replace `mamba` with `pip` using `pip install calliope`.
Change the command to `mamba create -n calliope -c conda-forge python && conda activate calliope && mamba install calliope`.
errors.golden_answer: Add `-c conda-forge` to the `mamba create` command.

errors.error_description: The README provides a fictitious command `calliope run-example` to run examples, which does not exist.
correction_candidates: Remove the sentence 'You can run them directly using the command `calliope run-example --name urban_scale`.'
Replace `calliope run-example --name urban_scale` with a Python script example, like `python -c 'import calliope; calliope.examples.urban_scale()'`
Change the command to `calliope examples --run urban_scale`.
Change the command to `python -m calliope.examples.urban_scale`.
errors.golden_answer: Remove the sentence 'You can run them directly using the command `calliope run-example --name urban_scale`.'
